channel.title: Comments on: Polemic Theology: How to Deal with Those Who Differ from Us

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: Owe,learn & cope with him who differs. We owe them the same Christ grants us when we differ with Him,longsuffering,forbearence and patience. We learn what is false,true and worth considering with him who differs with us in respect when possible and courage to stand opposed when needful.We cope with such in humility and meekness remembering what we are as sinners and if need be keep silent not answering a fool in his folly.Good 3 point question one we all ought to think upon and ready ourselves when the time comes because it most surely will.
